x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: When people leave prison, they have no job skills or official papers (IDs, diplomas) and struggle to find a stable job or home. This difficulty forces them back into old criminal habits, causing them to return to prison (recidivism) repeatedly.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A secure, controlled platform for correctional and re-entry services to manage and deliver educational training, securely store digital credentials, and automate pre-release service applications:

  • HR Service Delivery (HRSD) - Learning: Used to deliver digital literacy and vocational training modules within the secure correctional network and track certification progress.
  • Secure Case Management (CSM/Custom App): Manages a secure "Digital Wallet" for each participant to store verified copies of general education development, vocational certifications, and government IDs (like birth certificates) before release.
  • Flow Designer & IntegrationHub: Automates the bureaucratic processes: Pre-populating forms for housing assistance, driver's license applications, and job placement services before the individual is even released.
  • Public Sector Digital Services (PSDS): Provides the necessary framework for secure interaction with government identity and benefit agencies.

 

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

No technical dependencies highlighted for this solution

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

This is the biggest challenge establishing trust between the justice system, participants (former inmates), and external employers/government agencies regarding the security and integrity of the data will require extensive auditing and clear, transparent privacy policies.

Many facilities lack the necessary hardware (tablets, secure computer labs) or robust intranet infrastructure to run the HRSD learning modules effectively.
